backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing affected frontend files and components for photo rendering, fallback UI, and UI audit.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining theme variables for light/dark mode and applying background and text utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationOverl: Generates floating and falling animated hearts using randomized properties and inline keyframes.
frontend/src/components/PersonalPhotoFra: Displays a static personal photo with loading spinner and a romantic fallback when the image fails.
No button that disappears on hover using simple state toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for handling Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting with change listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing for unused backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, global styles, and custom animation keyframes/classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with ReactDOM, wraps it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineProposalPage: Implements the Valentine proposal UI with animations, images, a yes/no interaction flow, and triggers celebration on acceptance.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended fonts, radii, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing the personal photo display behavior.
